events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position using the online portal. All required documents including resume and cover letter were received.
Recruitment team reviewed the application and categorized it under Engineering roles focusing on software development based on candidate's experience and skills listed.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering hires was assigned to manage the candidate’s application and prepare it for the next steps in the hiring process.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to assess the candidate’s technical background and communication skills; candidate showed strong foundational knowledge.
Candidate responded enthusiastically to the screening feedback and expressed availability for the upcoming technical interview without any scheduling conflicts.
Technical interview was scheduled for May 15th with the engineering team, including both coding challenges and system design questions to evaluate problem-solving skills.
